title: Client has stopped working error
body: Every time I hit the play button to get to the login screen. Game worked fine last night. The only thing that has changed is windows 10 just updated.

replies.body: It sounds like your patcher might be corrupt if it's is not loading the login screen after hitting Launch.  My recommendation would be to review our [Patching Issues ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues)guide as a first step.  If it doesn't resolve your issue, I agree with Ventura that[ submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) would be a solid next step so our tech team can help you out.
I'd say sending a ticket to Riot Support is your best bet, as I don't think most people on here know a solution to your issue. https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us
I have now tried to uninstall and redownload the game with no luck.
